ðŸ“– Summary: Bark is a transformer-based text-to-audio model developed by Suno, capable of generating highly realistic, multilingual speech, music, background noise, and sound effects. It also supports nonverbal communications like laughing and crying. The model is available for commercial use under the MIT License and is intended for research and application development in the audio generation space.
